channel.title: Permits on Concho Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Permits on Concho Resources

item.title: Monthly Permits
item.description: Overview of Permitting Activity Live link to DrillingInfo which is updated daily Currently only shows horizontal permits Wells contains following permitting attributes: Company, Well Name, Well Type, Approval Date, Formation and Permit Depth 2nd map attempts to identify permitted well pads using clustering Note: Well counts do not include previously drilled or permitted wells at this time Top 20 operators are colored in map and chart April Permitting Activity {"
